Sets: CREATE TABLE Sets(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, setName VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL UNIQUE)
Types: CREATE TABLE Types(card_type_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, card_type VARCHAR[] NOT NULL UNIQUE)
Supertypes: CREATE TABLE Supertypes(supertype_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, super_type VARCHAR[] NOT NULL UNIQUE)
Cards: CREATE TABLE Cards(card_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, artist VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT NULL, additional_print BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, colors CHAR[] DEFAULT NULL, convertedManaCost INTEGER DEFAULT NULL, image_uri_normal VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, image_uri_small VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, manaCost VARCHAR(24) DEFAULT NULL, name VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT NULL, power CHAR(2) DEFAULT NULL, rarity VARCHAR(12) DEFAULT NULL, scryfallId VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT NULL, setName VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT NULL, supertypes VARCHAR[] DEFAULT NULL, text TEXT DEFAULT NULL, toughness CHAR(2) DEFAULT NULL, type VARCHAR(64) DEFAULT NULL, types VARCHAR[] DEFAULT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (setName) REFERENCES Sets(setname) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (types) REFERENCES Types(card_type) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (supertypes) REFERENCES Supertypes(super_type) ON DELETE CASCADE)
